Text.Page:
You're going to have to shuffle along faster than that if you're going to get anything accomplished, .

Get out there and take care of the {@LinkCreature:37#230#ravenous tyraks}, {@LinkCreature:37#220#eldritch reapers}, {@LinkCreature:37#240#naroder arachnens}, {@LinkCreature:37#250#infernal imps}, and {@LinkCreature:37#270#capricious ebon imps}.

Hope you wrote that down. I won't be repeating it.

Report to Shiosa at the Saleron Research Camp when you're finished.
I'm sorry, but I can't give you anything if you come to me before completing your mission.
